questions.text: What did Norm lose in the cold opening?
questions.explanation:
his filling.

	Ma Clavin had made pretzels for the gang at Cheers. Unfortunately, they were really hard, so when Norm bit into one, he lost his filling.

questions.text: Who did Frasier have a date with first?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	Lilith was played by Bebe Neuwirth. While only a guest star in this episode, she would later become a regular guest star. It wasn't until season 10 that she was added to the actual cast.

questions.text: Why didn't Frasier want to look at his date?
questions.correct: He got tired of counting the comb marks in her hair.
options: He actually loved to look at her.
He was in love with someone else.
questions.explanation:
He got tired of counting the comb marks in her hair.

	Lilith always wore her hair in a tight bun. This was why he was counting the comb marks in her hair. When she did take down her hair as seen in later episodes, she was actually a very pretty woman.

questions.text: Why did Frasier ask to use Sam's office?
options: to make out with his date
questions.explanation:
to weep.

	Frasier was getting discouraged with his inability to meet a decent woman. After his date went bad with Lilith, he just wanted to cry.

questions.text: Who did Sam set Frasier up with?
questions.explanation:
Candi.

	Candi was played by Jennifer Tilly. Tilly was born in 1958 and along with being an actress, she is also a poker player.

questions.text: What did the girl Sam set Frasier up with, want to drink?
questions.explanation:
something with bubbles.

	Candi was not very smart, which wa consistent with most of the women in Sam's life. Frasier initially turned Candi down because she was too fun.

questions.text: What direction did Frasier say he was going?
questions.explanation:
out.

	Frasier told Candi he was going in her direction. She asked what direction that was and he replied, "Out".

questions.text: What did Cliff say Carla needed on her?
questions.explanation:
a bell.

	Cliff made a comment that offended Carla and got smacked by Carla for it. He thought she wasn't around when he made the comment so he told Norm that they needed to put a bell on her.

No.

	Frasier had planned to marry Candi but Sam and Diane tried to talk him out of it. When Candi tried to give her input, Frasier yelled at her and told her she wasn't put on earth to think. Candi wasn't offended and agreed with Frasier, but decided that they shouldn't get married after all.

questions.text: What song did Woody play on the piano?
questions.explanation:
Heart and Soul.

	"Heart and Soul" was the only song that Woody knew how to play. When they told him it wasn't appropriate for a wedding, he played the same song, only slower. "Heart and Soul" was originally written in 1938 by Hoagy Carmichael (music) and Frank Loesser (lyrics).
